import axios from 'axios'; import React,{useEffect,useState} from 'react' import {Card,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rater from 'react-rater' import 'react-rater/lib/react-rater.css' function Movie({search,getFavorites,getFavoritMovie}) { const [film, setFilm] = useState([]) const getmovie = ()=>{ axios.get('https://fir-movie-e73ed-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/posts.json') .then ((response) => setFilm(response.data) ); } useEffect(()=> {getmovie() },[]) return( search ===''?
{film.map(el=> {el.Title} {el.Genre} View )}
: film.filter(el=> el.Title.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase())).map(el=>
{el.Title} {el.Genre} {el.Rate}
) ) } export default Movie
